name: Holman Design
tag_list: web-design, e-commerce, web-development, design-for-print, logo-design, brand-development
overview:
A friendly, creative partnership specialising in websites, branding and logos as well as design for print and retail spaces. Standards compliant, contemporary website design, build and hosting, web development and e-commerce. Wordpress site design and customisation. Valid XHTML and CSS.

Based in central Tunbridge Wells, Kent UK. Services include design for:

Web - We design, build and host standards compliant, contemporary websites and develop sites for dynamic content and functionality.

  1. Web Design Visuals and Wireframing
  2. Website, Coding and Site Hosting
  3. Search Engine Optimization
  4. Company Blogs and CMS Sites
  5. Site Development and e-Commerce
  6. HTML e-Mail Design and Marketing

Print - Design for print, packaging and associated products.

  1. Contemporary, clean, printable design
  2. Print Production and Management
  3. Press Advertising

Branding - Marketing, advertising, brands, id’s and more

  1. Logo Design and Corporate Identities
  2. Brand Design and Development
  3. Retail and Exhibition Design
